client.clientcontroller

Class ClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.clientcontroller.ClientController

  • public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
    Client controller class handling the client view and communications with the server.
    Since:
    April 13, 2020
    Author:
    Alexander Price

      ClientController(ClientView clientView, LogInView logInView)
      Creates a controller with the given ClientView and LogInView.

      • ClientController

        public ClientController(ClientView clientView,
                        LogInView logInView)
        Creates a controller with the given ClientView and LogInView.
        Parameters:
        clientView - ClientView to display to
        logInView - LogInView to get log in info from

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Attempts to connect to the server, catching if the server fails to connect and exiting.

      • attemptLogIn

        public boolean attemptLogIn(java.lang.String user,
                            java.lang.String password)
        Attempts to log in to the connected server with the given credentials. Returns whether the operation was successful or not.
        Parameters:
        user - username to log in with
        password - password to log in with
        Returns:
        whether or not the operation was successful

      • attemptEnroll

        public java.lang.String attemptEnroll(java.lang.String name,
                                      int section)
        Attempts to enroll in a given course using the connected server. Returns null if successful, or the server response is the operation failed.
        Parameters:
        name - name and number of the course to enroll in
        section - section of the course to enroll in
        Returns:
        server response

      • attemptUnenroll

        public java.lang.String attemptUnenroll(java.lang.String name,
                                        int section)
        Attempts to unenroll from a given course using the connected server. Returns null if successful, or the server response is the operation failed.
        Parameters:
        name - name and number of the course to unenroll from
        section - section of the course to unenroll from
        Returns:
        server response

      • retrieveCourses

        public void retrieveCourses(int type)
        Retrieves courses from the server. Parameter type is either 0 for the entire course catalog, or 1 for all enrolled courses for the currently logged in student.
        Parameters:
        type - type of course set to retrieve

      • attemptAdminAddOperation

        public java.lang.String attemptAdminAddOperation(java.lang.String courseName,
                                                 java.lang.String seats)
        Attempts to add either a course or offering as an admin using the connected server. Server will create an offering if the course already exists, or create a new course with one offering if the course doesn't already exist. Returns null if successful, or the server response is the operation failed.
        Parameters:
        courseName - name and number of the course
        seats - number of seats in the offering
        Returns:
        server response

      • quit

        public void quit()
        Cleanly disconnects from the server and closes all I/O streams.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
